entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-07-22
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Implicit interface implementation in derived class fails for embedded interop interface types explicitly implemented by base class #62863
  • Major performance regression of the array initialization pattern #62864
  • Emit DynamicallyAccessedMembers for where T : new() #62857
  • IDE0051 erroneously triggers for required awaitable/awaiter members #62856
    Backlog
  • Low level struct improvements allow returning references to a current method's stack #62850

Closed

  • Bug: `required` keyword completion does not work in `record` and `record struct` types #62873
  • Public API for "file-local types" #62254
    17.4
  • IDE warning: null possibility after de-nulling in do-while loop #62866
  • Emit `GC.AllocateUninitializedArray` for an initialized array creation expression #61011
    17.4

PullRequests

Created

  • Produce binding errors for incomplete members #62874
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • Move to a simpler form of checksum->solution caching in the remote workspace layer. #62872
    Area-IDE
  • Revert "Fix PR Validation pipeline" #62870
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Derive type names analyzer from AbstractBuiltInCodeStyleDiagnosticAnalyzer #62869
    Area-IDE, Community
  • Revert "Add array initialization optimization" #62868
    Area-Compilers
  • Fix async rename prefs string #62867
    Area-IDE
  • FindMethodSymbolInType - handle the case when a type definition is resolved to a type in a different module. #62865
    Area-Compilers
  • Move AnalyzerOptionsProvider to Analyzers layer #62859
    Area-IDE, Community
  • WIP not for review. #62854
    Area-IDE

Merged

  • Revert "Merge pull request #62853 from CyrusNajmabadi/oopCaching2" #62875
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Merge release/dev17.3 to main #62806
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #62871
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Ensure OOP solution fast-path cache properly refcounts items during processing #62853
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Ensure we don't throw first-chance exceptions if we have a null stack #62852
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #62828
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Remove unneeded 'using OptionSet = ...' #62769
    Area-IDE, Community, Next
  • Break unnecessary inheritance of parentheses analyzers #62862
    Area-IDE, Community, Next
  • Simplify `AbstractBuiltInCodeStyleDiagnosticAnalyzer` constructors #62826
    Area-IDE, Community, Next
  • Merge release/dev17.3 to release/dev17.3-vs-deps #62858
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Simplify task management in inline-rename code. #62842
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 327: Build ID 1895883 #62839

Updated

  • Document Outline Feature #61784
    Area-IDE
  • Run suppressors insofar as there are suppressible errors #62641
    Area-Compilers
  • Implement IAttributeOperation #59369
    Area-Compilers, Community, Feature - IOperation
  • File types EE support #62812
    Area-Compilers
  • Remove unnecessary tracking of unmatched parameters in method invocation escape analysis #62847
    Area-Compilers
  • HasChangesAsync should return false if the document content did not changed #62849
    Area-Interactive
  • Add ChecksumAlgorithm to project snapshot #62840
    Area-IDE
  • Improve circularity analysis in bases for some scenarios. #62799
    Area-Compilers
  • Remove support for 'ref scoped' #62788
    Area-Compilers
  • Enable updated escape rules if System.Runtime.CompilerServices.RuntimeFeature.ByRefFields exists #62304
    Area-Compilers, New Language Feature - Ref Fields
  • Support renaming multiple symbols in RenameLanguageService #62670
    Area-IDE
  • ci build cleanup #62845
    Area-Infrastructure
  • correctness build optimizations #62797
    Area-Infrastructure
